name: Prospective Residential ASHP (FS)
_description: Ultra-efficient heat pump target, switch fossil-based heating and associated cooling to heat pumps, non-cold-climate

market_entry_year_source.notes: Targeted year of breakthrough technology market entry

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Most aggressive performance level expected to be achievable via breakthrough R&D

installed_cost_source.notes: Cost that yields a 5 year overall payback period for given performance level and market entry year; based on comparison with counterfactual heating technology

product_lifetime_source.notes: Median of average lifetimes for 2030 'typical' residential ASHP

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

market_scaling_fractions_source.heating: Applies to all residential fuel-fired heating; no electric heating is switched by this ECM

cooling.title: RECS 2020 Microdata
cooling.fraction_derivation: Central AC multiple of 68% was determined as a proportion of total homes with a ducted cooling system where heating is done using any non-electric heating energy source. Total homes with ducted cooling (main air conditioning equipment type = central AC = 1) in the sample is 12,211 homes, and then filtered for homes with non-electric heating system (Main space heating fuel != electricity = 5) 12,211-3,949 homes.
